channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 哈里-凯恩在拜仁慕尼黑 8-1 大胜美因茨的比赛中上演帽子戏法，追平了一项有 60 年历史的纪录，并为球队保留了追赶领头羊拜耳勒沃库森的希望。#AFPSports
item.description:
Harry Kane scored a hat-trick as Bayern Munich thumped Mainz 8-1, equalling a 60-year-old record and keeping alive his team's hopes of catching leaders Bayer Leverkusen. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/bqWIJZsP2K pic.twitter.com/Uqyt9VMLXG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 豪尔赫-马丁（Jorge Martin）在周六的卡塔尔冲刺赛中夺冠，获得了新赛季 MotoGP 的首个积分，卫冕双料世界冠军弗朗切斯科-巴尼亚（Francesco Bagnaia）排名第四。#AFPSports
item.description:
#UPDATE Jorge Martin got the first points on the board in the new MotoGP season, winning Saturday's sprint in Qatar with defending double world champion Francesco Bagnaia in fourth. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/UX6RpWVCpX pic.twitter.com/xpWvOkUxoh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING England beat Ireland 23-22 in Six Nations rugby.#AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING England beat Ireland 23-22 in Six Nations rugby. #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/hhLCvCUJ1S

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）表示，关于在宪法中重新定义家庭和妇女角色的双重公投已被否决。
item.description:
#UPDATES A dual referendum in Ireland on redefining family and women's roles in the constitution has been defeated, Prime Minister Leo Varadkar said.https://t.co/zVuYxkYnK1 pic.twitter.com/lsZisVFh34

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 一个非政府组织说，在斋月到来之前，以色列军队和哈马斯武装分子之间战火纷飞，一艘满载为饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带的巴勒斯坦人提供食品的船只准备从塞浦路斯启航。
item.description:
A boat laden with food for Palestinians in war-ravaged Gaza was ready to set sail from Cyprus, an NGO said as fighting raged between Israeli troops and Hamas militants ahead of Ramadan.https://t.co/ev61USII1L pic.twitter.com/qUsLSWwyzi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #哈马斯在斋月期间强化人质协议立场，以 "煽动地区局势"：以色列总理办公室
item.description:
#BREAKING Hamas hardening hostage deal stance to 'inflame region' in Ramadan: Israel PM office pic.twitter.com/H3h6po6HVE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 埃弗顿在老特拉福德球场为上半场的两个点球付出了代价，曼联在周六的比赛中以 2-0 的比分战胜了埃弗顿，重新回到了胜利的轨道上，并保留了下赛季冠军联赛的希望。#AFPSports完整故事：
item.description:
⚽ Everton paid for conceding two first-half penalties at Old Trafford, as Manchester United bounced back to winning ways and keeping their Champions League hopes for next season alive, with a 2-0 victory on Saturday. #AFPSports
Full story: https://t.co/3Snhmp2EHR pic.twitter.com/0GoU18dv9R

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 基辅周六表示，俄罗斯对乌克兰赫尔松地区的炮击和袭击造成一人死亡，数人受伤，至少两名平民也在对该国中部和东部的袭击中丧生：
item.description:
Russian shelling and strikes on Ukraine's Kherson region killed one person and wounded several, with at least two civilians also killed in attacks on the centre and east of the country, Kyiv said Saturday.
Read more: https://t.co/O5YAfrzObl pic.twitter.com/sjXT4ZJJcL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #豪尔赫-马丁（Jorge Martin）赢得赛季揭幕战卡塔尔站 MotoGP 冲刺赛冠军#AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING Jorge Martin wins season-opening Qatar MotoGP sprint#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/hXSZZaiGAh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 意大利队在周六的六国赛主场比赛中以 31-29 的比分击败苏格兰队，赢得了 11 年来的首场胜利，同时也让爱尔兰队有机会在还有一场比赛的情况下赢得冠军。
item.description:
#UPDATE Italy won their first Six Nations home match in 11 years on Saturday, beating Scotland 31-29 and handing Ireland the chance to win the championship with a match to spare.#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/NFXDwzx7JB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #意大利在六国赛中以 31-29 击败苏格兰#AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING Italy stun Scotland 31-29 in Six Nations#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/AkWCSqVYTA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING Ireland referendum on family and women roles defeated：瓦拉德卡
item.description:
#BREAKING Ireland referendum on family and women's roles defeated: Varadkar pic.twitter.com/SESDEZzqSO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 🏉 法国队将在 1 月 31 日举行的 2025 年六国赛揭幕战中主场迎战威尔士队，而爱尔兰队将对阵英格兰队。#AFPSports
item.description:
🏉 France will host Wales in the 2025 Six Nations opener on January 31, while Ireland kick off against England, tournament organisers said as they unveiled the fixture schedule on Saturday. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/Z6D1wNQy8W pic.twitter.com/9WCElQYXVu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 梵蒂冈周六表示，教皇方济各已接受波兰主教安杰伊-迪乌巴（Andrzej Dziuba）的辞呈。全文如下
item.description:
Pope Francis has accepted the resignation of Polish bishop Andrzej Dziuba, accused of covering up child sexual abuse by at least two paedophile priests in his diocese, the Vatican said on Saturday, the second such decision in as many months.
Full story: https://t.co/8rqVngA4FT pic.twitter.com/ReG7mhw3EB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 英国外交大臣戴维-卡梅伦（David Cameron）周六在接受德国《南德意志报》（Sueddeutsche Zeitung）采访时表示，他反对向乌克兰派遣西方军队，即使是执行训练任务。卡梅伦说，训练任务最好在国外进行。
item.description:
British foreign minister David Cameron said he opposes sending Western troops to Ukraine, even for training missions, in an interview with German daily Sueddeutsche Zeitung published on Saturday. Cameron said training missions are best carried out abroad.https://t.co/lJ5b8vS3Ix pic.twitter.com/hiC033E5P1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 巴基斯坦第一位被杀害的女领导人贝娜齐尔-布托的遗孀阿西夫-阿里-扎尔达里周六第二次当选总统。扎尔达里以 411 票对反对党支持的候选人的 181 票当选：
item.description:
#UPDATE Asif Ali Zardari, the widower of Pakistan's slain first female leader Benazir Bhutto, was voted in as president for a second time on Saturday. Zardari was voted in with 411 votes to 181 for the opposition-backed candidate.
Read more: https://t.co/esuXn62TNC pic.twitter.com/dtJeJU8ihH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 西班牙车手豪尔赫-马丁（Jorge Martin）在周六举行的卡塔尔 MotoGP 赛季揭幕战和冲刺赛中创下杆位单圈纪录，世界冠军弗朗切斯科-巴尼亚（Francesco Bagnaia）在第二排发车。#AFPSports阅读更多：
item.description:
Spaniard Jorge Martin set a lap record on his way to pole position for the season-opening Qatar MotoGP and sprint on Saturday with world champion Francesco Bagnaia starting on the second row. #AFPSports
Read more: https://t.co/bQo1uOiaWB pic.twitter.com/QgaKm0naED

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）的中间派联盟将于周六在里尔启动欧洲议会选举竞选活动，他正试图遏制极右翼势力的迅速崛起，并强调加大对乌克兰支持的重要性。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron's centrist alliance was due on Saturday to launch off its campaign for European Parliament elections in Lille, as he tries to curb the rapid rise of the far right and hammer the importance of greater support for Ukraine.https://t.co/UYQWDZtszL pic.twitter.com/vO6ZNieHot

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在尼日利亚，神圣的斋月将于下周初开始。尼日利亚正面临着一代人以来最严重的经济危机，食品通胀率高达 35%，使得这个非洲人口最多的穆斯林国家的许多人都在为购买食品而苦苦挣扎。更多信息
item.description:
The holy fasting month of Ramadan begins early next week in Nigeria, with the worst economic crisis in a generation and food inflation at 35%, leaving many in Africa's most populous Muslim country struggling to buy food.
Read more: https://t.co/hA22CrK1r4 pic.twitter.com/b6uTanleWr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 小熊维尼和小猪佩奇在一部超低成本恐怖片中大开杀戒，该片被拉兹奖（Razzie Awards）评为年度最差电影。恐怖片《小熊维尼》（Winnie-the-Pooh：血与蜜 "的制作成本不到 25 万美元。
item.description:
An ultra-low-budget horror film in which Winnie the Pooh and Piglet go on a brutal killing spree has been named the year's worst movie by the Razzie Awards. Slasher movie "Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey" made for less than $250,000.https://t.co/1si34I09EU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 已故俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜亚周六发表了一条消息，称其父母感谢前来悼念儿子的俄罗斯民众。"感谢记忆！给人以希望的记忆！".➡️
item.description:
The parents of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny thanked the crowds of Russians paying their respects to their son in a message published Saturday by his widow Yulia Navalnaya. "Thank you for the memory! The memory which gives hope!".
➡️ https://t.co/unMfUaFJK7 pic.twitter.com/p5ZyZ1yFVy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #根据当地媒体对国会议员、省议员和参议员的投票统计，扎尔达里以 411 票对反对党支持的候选人的 181 票当选。
item.description:
#UPDATE Zardari was voted in with 411 votes to 181 for the opposition-backed candidate, according to a local media tally of votes by national MPs, provincial MPs and senators. pic.twitter.com/KzDshm2D6F

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 巴基斯坦阿西夫-阿里-扎尔达里第二次当选总统：当地媒体
item.description:
#BREAKING Pakistan's Asif Ali Zardari voted president for second time: local media pic.twitter.com/q9nkFEWOjq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 德国拜耳公司首席执行官比尔-安德森（Bill Anderson）表示，拜耳希望在四年内推出草甘膦（除草剂 "Roundup "的活性成分）的替代品。在此之前，许多法庭案件都与草甘膦涉嫌致癌有关。➡️
item.description:
Bayer hopes to introduce a substitute for glyphosate - the active ingredient in weed killer Roundup - within four years, Bill Anderson, chief executive of the German company said, after numerous court cases linked to its suspected cancerous effects.
➡️ https://t.co/imwT4mC7uX pic.twitter.com/ljZhX53Fj4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 瑞典周六表示，它将恢复对联合国近东巴勒斯坦难民救济和工程处的援助，首批援助金额为2000万美元。与许多其他国家一样，在以色列指控十几名雇员参与了10月7日的哈马斯袭击事件后，瑞典暂停了对近东救济工程处的援助。
item.description:
Sweden said Saturday it was resuming aid to the UN agency for Palestinians with an initial disbursement of $20mn. Like many other countries, Sweden suspended aid to UNRWA after Israel accused a dozen of employees of involvement in the Oct 7 Hamas attack.https://t.co/Er9jDpGavQ pic.twitter.com/ylXYx3r56k

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 伊朗周六谴责美国科技巨头 Meta 删除伊朗最高领袖阿亚图拉-阿里-哈梅内伊的 Facebook 和 Instagram 账户的决定，称其 "侵犯了言论自由"。更多信息
item.description:
Iran on Saturday denounced US tech giant Meta's decision to remove the Facebook and Instagram accounts of its supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, calling it a "violation of freedom of expression".
Read more: https://t.co/EFOHV1tGGl pic.twitter.com/Lv3uJorzKO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 中国高层官员周六承认，中国需要采取更多措施来促进就业和稳定房地产市场。2023 年中期，中国青年失业率达到了前所未有的 21.3%，而房价则连续数月下跌。
item.description:
China needs to do more to boost employment and stabilise its property market, top officials acknowledged on Saturday. Youth unemployment hit an unprecedented 21.3% in mid-2023, while home prices have in turn fallen for months.https://t.co/R7hKwjGERS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 印度尼西亚交通部表示，将对两名飞行员在一次飞行中睡着后当地航空公司巴蒂克航空公司（Batik Air）展开调查。在1月25日从东南苏拉威西岛飞往雅加达的航班上，一名飞行员和一名副驾驶同时睡着了28分钟。
item.description:
Indonesia's transport ministry said it would open a probe into local airline Batik Air after two pilots fell asleep during a flight. A pilot and co-pilot were simultaneously asleep for 28 mins during a flight from South East Sulawesi to Jakarta on Jan 25.https://t.co/3QvLkSVWtq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安周六表示，安卡拉 "坚决支持 "巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯。自加沙战争开始以来，埃尔多安一直是以色列最激烈的批评者之一：
item.description:
Turkish President Recep Recep Tayyip Erdogan said on Saturday Ankara "firmly backs" Palestinian militant group Hamas. Erdogan has been one of the most virulent critics of Israel since the start of the war in Gaza.
Full story: https://t.co/LGdsM8dXhe pic.twitter.com/ixFJLhb85x

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 🇮🇪 爱尔兰在举行双重公投后开始计票，公投的目的是使宪法中有关家庭组成和妇女 "家庭生活 "的内容现代化。投票是反映天主教会影响力减弱的最新尝试。➡️
item.description:
🇮🇪 Ireland began counting votes after a  double referendum to modernise constitutional references to the make-up of a family and women's "life within the home". The votes are the latest attempt to reflect the waning influence of the Catholic Church.
➡️ https://t.co/4LVUaopUZb pic.twitter.com/Dz9RrKXp87

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024
